definition: late childbirth/to have a child at a later age
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
to marry and give birth late

sentences.english: India Offering Cash Incentives to Control Birthrates.
sentences.chinese: 印度現金獎勵晚育夫婦。

sentences.english: Women with a university education are choosing to have children later in life, a British research reveals.
sentences.chinese: 英國一項調查表明，上過大學的女性通常選擇晚育。

sentences.english: It seems like a lot more women are deciding to have babies much later these days.
sentences.chinese: 時下看起來好像很多女士都傾向於晚育。

sentences.english: In china , both late marriages and late child-birth are advocated , in addition to fewer and better births .
sentences.chinese: 在中國，晚婚晚育和少生優生均受到提倡鼓勵。

sentences.english: Late marriage and late childbirth shall be encouraged.
Late marriage and late child birth shall be encouraged.

definition: to marry and give birth late
to bear/to give birth/to grow/to rear/to bring up (children)/fertility
length of married life/marriageable age/actual marrying age
to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
